Plot: At a remote monastery in Tibet, a rare and dangerous artifact mysteriously disappears. Aloysius Pendergast agrees to take up the search that leads him and Constance to the maiden voyage of the Britannia--and to an Atlantic crossing fraught with terror.
Characters: Aloysius X.L. Pendergast, Constance Greene, Diogenes Pendergast, Carol Mason, Gordon LeSeur, Scott Blackburn, Jordan Ambrose, Commodore Cutter, Victor Hentoff, Patrick Kemper, Roger Mayles, Marya Kazulin, Gavin Bruce, Inge Larssen, Emily Dahlberg
